justification: The Experimental Design states that an "adapted version of the BEAST ... [is] a validated perceptual judgment task known to reliably measure individuals' social information use."
In the questionnaire description the authors note they "measured individualism (Triandis & Gelfand, 1998)."

measured_by: Mehrabian and Stefl Social Conformity scale (1995)
justification: The same questionnaire section reports that they measured "social conformity (Mehrabian and Stefl 1995)."

measured_by: Steinberg & Monahan Resistance to Peer Influence Scale (2007)
justification: Participants also completed a measure of "resistance to peer influence (Steinberg & Monahan 2007)."
